```{r color-cube-1, fig.width=5, fig.height=5}
library(ggplot2)
library(magrittr)
k <- data.frame(x= 0, y= 0, co="#000000")
r <- data.frame(x=-5, y=-5, co="#FF0000") 
g <- data.frame(x= 7, y= 0, co="#00FF00")
b <- data.frame(x= 0, y= 7, co="#0000FF")
y <- data.frame(x= 2, y=-5, co="#FFFF00")
z <- data.frame(x=-5, y= 2, co="#FF00FF")
m <- data.frame(x= 7, y= 7, co="#00FFFF")
w <- data.frame(x= 2, y= 2, co="#FFFFFF")

r <- data.frame(x=-4, y=-4, co="#FF0000") 
y <- data.frame(x= 3, y=-4, co="#FFFF00")
w <- data.frame(x= 3, y= 3, co="#FFFFFF")
z <- data.frame(x=-4, y= 3, co="#FF00FF")


df <- rbind(k, r, g, b, y, z, w)
dg <- rbind(k, r, k, g, k, b)

ggplot(dg, aes(x, y)) + 
  geom_path(col="white") +
  geom_text(col=dg$co, label=dg$co, angle=-45, hjust=0.5) +
  expand_limits(x=c(-7, 9)) +
  expand_limits(y=c(-7, 9)) +
  theme_void() +
  theme(
    panel.background = 
      element_rect(fill="#808080")
  )
```

```{r color-cube-2, fig.width=5, fig.height=5}
dg <- rbind(k, r, y, g, k, b, m, g, m, w, y, r, z, w, z, b)

ggplot(dg, aes(x, y)) + 
  geom_path(col="white") +
  geom_text(col=dg$co, label=dg$co, angle=-45, hjust=0.5) +
  expand_limits(x=c(-7, 9)) +
  expand_limits(y=c(-7, 9)) +
  theme_void() +
  theme(
    panel.background =
    	element_rect(fill="#808080")
  )
```

```{r white-yellow-green-magenta-face, fig.width=5, fig.height=5}
x_seq <- seq(y$x, g$x, length=256)
y_seq <- seq(y$y, g$y, length=256)
z_seq <- seq(0, w$y-y$y, length=256)
c_seq <- rgb(255:0, 255, 0, maxColorValue=255)
face <- data.frame(
	x=rep(x_seq, 256), 
	y=rep(y_seq, each=256)+rep(z_seq, 256),
	co=rgb(
		rep(255:0, 256), 
		rep(255, 256^2),
	  rep(0:255, each=256),
	  maxColorValue=255))
ggplot(face, aes(x, y)) +
  geom_point(color=face$co, size=1) +
  expand_limits(x=c(-7, 9)) +
  expand_limits(y=c(-7, 9)) +
  theme_void() +
  theme(
    panel.background =
      element_rect(fill="#808080"))
```
